main event: Multiple observers in Los Alamos, New Mexico reported sightings of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) on May 3 and 4, 1949, noting bright lights moving at high speeds.
interesting points: The observers described one sighting as having a apparent size similar to that of aircraft landing lights., The objects were reported to have a top altitude between 10-150 feet., Objects were consistently reported to move from South-East to North-West., The sightings were brief, typically lasting only a few seconds., At least two different observers reported similar characteristics of the lights, with some variations in color and size.
sighted object: bright white lights moving quickly across the sky
witness description: Observers included Security Inspectors associated with the AEC.
